Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory717.jpg'}
{3: "You're back in your room—currently brimming with birthday gifts—after a busy day."}
{3: "Your room's lights flicker twice when you're done showering. Could be a sign of unstable voltage... but it puts you on alert mode nonetheless because it never happened before."}
{3: 'You continue drying yourself with a towel until the lights flicker again.'}
{2: 'You should probably check the circuit.', 3: '7'}
{3: "Wrapping yourself in a towel, you carefully push open the bathroom door and peek outside. Fortunately, there's nothing."}
{3: "You thought something supernatural was going on and are thankful that it was just the voltage being unstable. Right when you're about to let your guard down..."}
{3: 'With a "pop," your room falls into complete darkness.'}
{3: 'And with it, you stumble and fall.'}
{3: 'A few seconds into fumbling around, you see the curtains fluttering in the night breeze.'}
{3: 'The window is open, and the floor is bathed in silver moonlight, along with a pair of pale feet.'}
{3: 'A white-haired girl is sitting on the windowsill, frowning at you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'You seem quite popular?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Luna's gaze shifts to the pile of gifts by my bed."}
{2: 'Doing just fine, I suppose.', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "You're making yourself too vulnerable now. See, I could harm you now if I wanted to, and you would be totally defenseless. Now...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As your eyes adjust to the dim light, you try to steady yourself by leaning on the table and slowly stand up.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Stop moving!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "God only knows what's gonna happen if you don't stop moving now. This is not a joke.", 4: '1'}
{3: "With Luna's sharpened gaze and the tension in the air, you find yourself frozen where you've been standing."}
{2: 'Luna, what do you want?', 3: '27'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I need you to do as I say. Take two steps forward.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Following Luna's instructions, I take two careful steps forward."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Now, you can turn around.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Holding your breath, I turn around... On the table is a round, vitrum-colored snow globe with intricate decorations inside.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's fragile. Watch your butt. It's gonna shatter into pieces if it falls.", 4: '1'}
{3: "But you can't seem to remember who gave you this as a gift."}
{2: 'Where did this come from...', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Who in the world gave me this...', 3: '35'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Are you for real? Argh... you really get on my nerves, do you know that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Forget it. I was just passing by and thought I'd drop in before the day ends...", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I suppose humans care a lot about their birthdays. I always looked forward to birthdays when I was with my sister. The best thing about a birthday is getting gifts from people, and I figured the same went for you, too...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wishes are just as important, though.', 3: '39'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Fine. Happy Birthday. There, happy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Well then, see you next time. Have a good night's sleep now...", 4: '1'}
